channel.title: Introspect on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Introspect on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Thanksgiving 2010 - A Long Weekend
item.description: A long weekend (four days) - many of my friends are on trips visiting places. I’m sitting here writing this post! I couldn’t go due to work. I had to work for a couple of hours exactly in the middle of the four days so I stayed back. It sure doesn’t feel good but not as bad as I imagined it to be. Almost 3/4th of the long weekend has gone by.
